destiny.core

Class PGif

  • java.lang.Object
    • destiny.core.PGif

  • public class PGif
extends java.lang.Object
    This class uses the OpenImaging GifDecoder to make a gif that is drawable to a PApplet
    Version:
    12/5/2020
    Author:
    Nathaniel

      Creates a gif at the given with the given gif

      • PGif

        public PGif(int x,
            int y,
            java.lang.String pathName)
        Creates a gif at the given with the given gif
        Parameters:
        x - The x coordinate of the top left of the gif
        y - The y coordinate of the top left of the gif
        pathName - The path to the gif

    • Method Detail

      • draw

        public void draw(processing.core.PApplet window)
        Draws the gif to the given window
        Parameters:
        window - The PApplet that the gif should be drawn to
        Postcondition:
        The PApplet will have a gif drawn to it
